[message]
You can't die in this level!
You will learn how to die later ;)

Press space to jump,
if you hold space you will jump a bit higher.

You will gain speed automatically

Just get used to the controls.
Have fun! ;)
[/message]
[finishMessage]
Great you completed the first level!

Press ENTER to load the next one
or press ESCAPE to return to menu
[/finishMessage]
